about_the_game:
This Jagged Alliance 2 | Wildfire Digital Deluxe Content allows players an in-depth insight into an unique game universe.

The Mercenaries Artbook & Compendium brings together the most striking artistic impressions and mercs information and stats of the game, giving you a fabulously entertaining trip into the wonderful world of “Jagged Alliance ll and Wildfire“!

The distinctive photos of the unforgotten pioneer in nude photography Günter Blum expanded by the unique Mercs compendium provide an extraordinary opportunity to plunge into a world of breathtaking detail!

Besides the 80-pages Merc’s Compendium this Digital Deluxe Content also includes 5 Poster in hires resolutions of 4961 x 3508 px, 6 Wallpaper in Full-HD and 4K resolutions as well as Avatars of all 58 A.I.M. and M.E.R.C. mercenaries of Jagged Alliance 2 and Wildfire in resolutions of up to 1024 x 1024 pixels.

CONTENT:

  • 80-pages Mercenaries Artbook & Compendium (PDF Format)
  • 6 Wallpaper in Full-HD and 4K resolutions
  • 5 Poster in resolutions of 4961x3508 px
  • Avatars of all 58 A.I.M. and M.E.R.C. mercenaries in resolutions of 64 x 64, 128 x 128, 256 x 256, 512 x 512 and 1024 x 1024 pixel

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS:XP / Vista / 7 / 8
  • Processor:Intel or AMD Singlecore CPU
  • Memory:512 MB RAM
  • Graphics:3D Graphics card with DirectX support and 64 MB RAM
  • DirectX®:9.0c
  • Hard Drive:1.5 GB HD space
  • Sound:DirectX 9 compatible
  • Other Requirements:Broadband Internet connection
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS:XP / Vista / 7 / 8
  • Processor:Intel or AMD Singlecore CPU
  • Memory:1 GB RAM
  • Graphics:3D Graphics card with DirectX support and 128 MB RAM
  • DirectX®:9.0c
  • Hard Drive:2 GB HD space
  • Sound:DirectX 9 compatible
  • Other Requirements:Broadband Internet connection
